lemma: Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love
context1: "Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love." "Loving" is not merely an activity of God, nor is love an attribute, per se, but God IS love. The human capacity to love is a gift from God. Without God, love cannot be defined or even exist. God is love.
